groups.title: Groups
groups.description: Explore the groups in Students for Palestine Trondheim

action.title: Action Committee
action.description: The action committee organize and coordinate actions and demonstrations.

design.title: Design and Social Media
design.description: Design and Social Media are responsible for all our graphic designs and all posts on our different platforms.

events.title: Events Committee
events.description: The events committee are responsible for planning events, both social and cultural.

it.title: IT Committee
it.description: The IT committee work with managing and developing the digital solutions of the organization, like the page you're reading right now. ;)

stand.title: Stand Committee
stand.description: The stand committee are responsible for stands, posters, and recruitment on campus.

writing.title: Writing Group
writing.description: The writing group are tasked with writing texts, opinion pieces, and other works of similar nature.

press.title: Press
press.description: Read recent press releases from Students for Palestine
press.lead:
